answerText: fMRI [or functional magnetic resonance imaging; or functional MRI] [10] Alzheimer's disease can be detected early by asking patients to perform this task while undergoing an fMRI. An inability to do this is prosopagnosia.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 10 | 16 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The fact that deoxygenated blood is paramagnetic is the basis for the BOLD contrast used in this procedure. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this variant of magnetic resonance imaging used specifically to measure blood flow in the brain.
